document_data.name: Kameros
document_data.mainbody:
'''Kameros''' was an overworked [[Flaming Fist]] cook stationed in the [[Basilisk Gate]] barracks of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''One of the men complained about hair in his stew. His hair!''|Cook Kameros}}
document_data.Description: Kameros was a crimson-skinned [[tiefling]] with stubby pointy horns and a big hair of curly brown hair.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Kameros slaved in the kittens of the Basilisk Gate barracks in the [[Baldur's Gate/Eastway|Eastway]] district, feeding a seeming endless number of ravenous Flaming Fist mercenaries. The tiefling worked hard and could barely keep up with the job's demands.
